name: Add new Close CRM contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in Close CRM, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1kC8za5GIyEi3bjVbr1lJLj-ZoRtancS-5A31O8r6rrU/edit?usp=sharing).
